trans-unit.source: Manages synchronous [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] serializers and type converters.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia síncrona [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] serializadores e conversores de tipo.

trans-unit.source: XpsSerializationManager manages synchronous serializers and type converters that write content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: XpsSerializationManager gerencia serializadores síncronas e conversores de tipo para gravar o conteúdo <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManagerAsync> manages asynchronous serializers and type converters that store content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManagerAsync>gerencia os serializadores assíncronos e conversores de tipo que armazenam o conteúdo para um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument></xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManagerAsync>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides methods for acquiring serialization readers and writers for different parts of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que fornece métodos para adquirir os leitores de serialização e gravadores para diferentes partes de um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify batch mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para especificar o modo de lote. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes and writes all buffered data.
trans-unit.target: Confirma todas as alterações e grava todos os dados armazenados em buffer.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the serialization manager is in batch mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o Gerenciador de serialização está em modo de lote.

trans-unit.source: Batch mode is set in the `batchMode` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Modo de lote é definido no `batchMode` parâmetro o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the manager is in batch mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o Gerenciador estiver em modo de lote; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] serialized object to the document package.
trans-unit.target: Salva um especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] serializado do objeto para o pacote do documento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] serialized object to save.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] serializado do objeto a ser salvo.

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of pages or documents to process for font-subsetting.
trans-unit.target: Define o número de páginas ou de documentos para processar de subconjuntos de fontes.

trans-unit.source: The default font-subsetting `countPolicy` is 1.
trans-unit.target: Os subconjuntos de fontes padrão `countPolicy` é 1.

trans-unit.source: `countPolicy` defines either a number of pages or documents dependent on the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> enumeration value specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager.SetFontSubsettingPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `countPolicy`define um número de páginas ou documentos dependentes de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>valor de enumeração especificado para o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager.SetFontSubsettingPolicy%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager.SetFontSubsettingPolicy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>

trans-unit.source: |FontSubsetterCommitPolicy|CountPolicy| |-------------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>|Always 1 (the whole document sequence).| |<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>|Number of documents.| |<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>|Number of pages.| |<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>|Not applicable.|
trans-unit.target: | FontSubsetterCommitPolicy | CountPolicy | |-------------------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>| Sempre 1 (a sequência de todo o documento). | | <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>| Número de documentos. | | <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>| Número de páginas. | | <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>| Não aplicável. |</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>

trans-unit.source: The number of pages or documents to process at a time for font subsetting.
trans-unit.target: O número de páginas ou de documentos para processar de uma vez para subconjuntos de fontes.

trans-unit.source: Sets the granularity at which font-subsetting is performed.
trans-unit.target: Define a granularidade em que os subconjuntos de fontes é executado.

trans-unit.source: The default font-subsetting policy is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>.
trans-unit.target: A política de subconjuntos de fontes padrão é <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>

trans-unit.source: When font glyphs for text in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document are saved in the document package, the document text displays identically on any computer or printer.
trans-unit.target: Quando os glifos de fonte para o texto em uma [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento são salvas no pacote do documento, o texto do documento exibe forma idêntica em qualquer computador ou impressora.

trans-unit.source: If glyphs are not saved in document and the required font is not installed on the local computer or printer, the rendering device must substitute glyphs from another font.
trans-unit.target: Se os glifos não são salvas no documento e a fonte necessária não está instalada no computador local ou impressora, o dispositivo de renderização deve substituir glifos de outra fonte.

trans-unit.source: Substituting glyphs can change the appearance of the text when a different font is used.
trans-unit.target: Substituir glifos pode alterar a aparência do texto quando uma fonte diferente é usada.

trans-unit.source: SetFontSubsettingPolicy determines the granularity of font-subsetting.
trans-unit.target: SetFontSubsettingPolicy determina a granularidade de subconjuntos de fontes.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> (default) is the most efficient and enables the pages of all documents in a document sequence to share one font-subset that contains only the glyphs that are actually used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>(padrão) é o mais eficiente e permite que as páginas de todos os documentos em uma sequência de documento para compartilhar um subconjunto de fonte que contém somente os glifos que, na verdade, são usados.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>

trans-unit.source: When creating interleaved documents, font-subsetting across a document sequence can require a large amount of memory to hold the complete document until the final font-subset can be determined.
trans-unit.target: Quando criar intercaladas documentos, subconjuntos de fontes em uma sequência de documento podem exigir uma grande quantidade de memória para manter o documento completo até que o subconjunto de fonte final pode ser determinado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> can be specified to reduce application memory requirements when you create interleaved documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>ou <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>pode ser especificado para reduzir a memória do aplicativo requisitos ao criar intercaladas documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies></xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>

trans-unit.source: When `policy` is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>, all the glyphs for all fonts that are used in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document are saved, even glyphs for characters that not actually used in the text.
trans-unit.target: Quando `policy` é <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>, todos os glifos para todas as fontes usadas no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento são salvos, até mesmo glifos de caracteres que na verdade não usados no texto.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the font-subsetting policy.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que especifica a política de subconjuntos de fontes.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serializer requests a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serializador solicitações um <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handlers, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre manipuladores de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a page or document finishes serialization.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma página ou documento finaliza a serialização.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handlers, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre manipuladores de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
